about_the_game:
The playable demo of the point and click game Grandma Badass is available!
You will be able to play the tutorial, the prologue and the beginning of chapter 1 for free on this demo for Windows PC!
Expect more than an hour of play with the demo!

In total, more than 8 hours of gameplay await you on GrandMa Badass!
The demo allows you to dive right into the adventure of our raging granny.

You will be able to play the tutorial, the prologue which actually confines Grandma in her house and the beginning of chapter 1 with the first 2 puzzles to solve; the one of the mask making for the covid and the one of the bag deal with Kevin's Coffee...

It's more than an hour of gameplay that awaits you, if you have never played Grandma Badass when this episode is released in May 2021.

Enjoy, have fun and above all...don't forget that this chapter 1 is only the beginning of a long adventure available on Steam from November 22nd 2022!
